alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 12 at 2:42AM MST until February 12 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Areas of dense fog resulting in visibility of one quarter mile or less. * WHERE...The eastern Magic Valley, Snake Plain, and Arco Desert region, including but not limited to Burley, Rupert, American Falls, Aberdeen, Chubbuck, Pocatello, Fort Hall, Blackfoot, Atomic City, Idaho National Laboratory, Mud Lake, Idaho Falls, Ammon, Rigby, Rexburg, and St. Anthony. This includes portions of Interstate 15, Interstate 86, and Interstate 84. * WHEN...Until 10 AM this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to areas of low visibility are expected. Very light ice accumulations may also result in isolated slick road conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, be prepared to encounter sudden drops in visibility. Slow down, use low beam headlights or fog lights, and leave plenty of distance between you and other vehicles in case of sudden stops. Do not stop on the roadway.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain
